name: Lost Memories (RodNas)
description:
Description:

Your goal?

Exit the lab in 60 seconds before the scientists miss an experiment and send the whole lab back to the past.
You will be the only one to keep your memory and be able to get out of this endless loop.
Complete all puzzles before it4' too late.

-------------------------------------------------

Controls:

ZQSD - Movement

Left Click - Interact

E - Open box and interact

1 - Use the paper

-------------------------------------------------

A2 IIM Student's game

Made for Ludum Dare 47,  Theme : Stuck in a loop

Game Designers :

Stanislas RADO : https://www.linkedin.com/in/stanislas-rado
